minecraft:written_book_content.title: The Library
minecraft:written_book_content.author: Minecraft
pages: The Great Libraries were a place of vast knowledge and unimaginable power, thought to be lost a long time ago. Now, here you stand, bearing witness to even a fraction of the power that those lost libraries may have held.
Impossibly, this humble Library still contains echoes of the past, remnants of power unknown. While this power has since faded into mere echoes through the passing of time, It makes you wonderâ€¦
If this library could survive, could there be more out there, yearning to be uncovered?
